categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Laret Soveral was a female human Jedi Master of the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. She was the Master of Jedi Padawan Orla Jareni. Laret and her Padawan, alongside Master Simmix and Padawan Cohmac Vitus, were involved in the crisis between Eiram and E'ronoh. She wielded a blue-bladed lightsaber.
